After Rani Jhansi, Kangana To Play Jayalalithaa & Fans Think She’ll Get A National Award For It
After Rani Jhansi, Kangana To Play Jayalalithaa & Fans Think She’ll Get A National Award For It
A movie star with a sure-shot success formula in her early phase of career and a politician who was best described as the queen of Tamil politics, Jayalalithaa enjoyed the love and affection of millions of her supporters. When she died, she left the nation mourning.
dbsjeyaraj.com
Now, a biopic on the life of the Amma, as Jayalalithaa was fondly called, is in the works, and finally the mystery as to who will play the lead role in the movie has been solved. Hailed as the Queen of Bollywood, Kangana Ranaut has bagged the lead role.
awaaznation.com
Happy to have bagged this opportunity, Kangana Ranaut said, “Jayalalithaaji is one of the biggest female success stories of this century. She was a superstar and went on to become an iconic politician, it’s a great concept for a mainstream film. I am honoured to be a part of this mega project.”

The movie will be penned by Baahubali and Manikarnika: The Queen of Jhansi fame KV Vijayendra Prasad. The film will be made in two languages. While the Tamil version will be called Thalaivi, the biopic in Hindi will be called Jaya. The biographical film will be directed by Vijay, who is known for his works in films including Madrasapattinam and Deiva Thirumagal.
“Jayalalithaa madam was one of the most prominent leaders of our country. Making a film on her life is a big responsibility and we are going to do it with utmost care and honesty. I am proud and happy that a talented actress like Kangana Ranautji will portray the dynamic role of this dynamic leader,” director Vijay was quoted as saying.
